name: GAZOLINAS
description:
THE ULTIMATE ARCADE RACING EXPERIENCE

GAZOLINAS is a realistic arcade racing game with classic cars, diverse tracks, and global competition. You can drive precisely, customize your cars, and play different game modes in various environments.

FEATURES:

  • Realistic physics that blend arcade and simulation driving


  • Multiple environments with multiple tracks each, including real-world roads from Japan, technical tracks for drifting or racing, and open style tracks with surreal ramps for arcade gameplay


  • Dynamic weather and time that change the appearance and feel of the tracks


  • Various game modes such as best lap, best race, most drift points, zombie smashing, and more


  • Car customization that allows you to modify suspension height/stiffness, differential lock, wheel camber, paint color, wheel design and color


  • Global leaderboards that rank your performance based on the settings of the current game


  • Controls support for keyboard/gamepad with full Steam Deck support

FUTURE FEATURES:

  • Custom achievements for open game mode where you can just drive around and explore
  • Track maker that allows players to create and play each others tracks
  • More everything including visual customisation, cars, environments, tracks and everything

GAZOLINAS is an Early Access game that is still in development. It may have some bugs and missing features. I appreciate your feedback and support to make this game better.

GAZOLINAS is a game for anyone who loves the thrill of speed, the challenge of precision, and the nostalgia of classic cars.

GAZOLINAS is more than just a racing game. It’s a journey through time and space with classic cars via an internet connection! Whether you want to race, drift, or smash zombies, GAZOLINAS has it all.

Feel free to buy this product and support independent video game developers! Or join the official Discord and get directly involved with the development of this game!

Get GAZOLINAS now and join the race!
